description: Create a service type unit of measure quantity.
permissions: User must be an admin or have update permission on the quantified resource (Pundit policy for the quantifies record).
side_effects: Creates a service type unit of measure quantity record.
validation_notes: --service-type-unit-of-measure, --quantifies-type, and --quantifies-id are required. quantity, explicit_quantity, and calculated_quantity (server-managed) must be numeric between 0 and 50,000. A service type unit of measure quantity must be unique by service type unit of measure and quantifies; if a material type is present, uniqueness also includes material type.

flags.name: --service-type-unit-of-measure
flags.description: Service type unit of measure ID (required)

flags.name: --quantity
flags.validation: Must be between 0 and 50,000 when provided.

flags.name: --explicit-quantity
flags.validation: Must be between 0 and 50,000 when provided.
